description:
Medication monitoring: prevention of diffuse intravascular coagulation conditions during infusion and monitoring of coagulation therapy effects lntraoperative monitoring.
Blood transfusion therapy: monitoring coagulation function when using blood transfusion to treat acute blood loss, anemia, sepsis, micro virus, canine distemper, jaundice and other diseases.
Surgical procedures: pet sterilization, cesarean section, foreign body extraction, gastric torsion repositioning and fixation, splenectomy, liver tumor resection, thoracotomy, internal fixation of fracture, patella repositioning, skid reconstructive surgery, femoral head resection artificial femoral head replacement and other shell pre-operative coagulation index monitoring to reduce surgical risks.
